code: import React,{useRef,useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";var ListComponent=function ListComponent(props){var newCategory='';var terms=props.terms;return React.createElement("div",{className:"termList"},terms.map(function(item){if(item.Term=='')return'';var isNewCategory=item.url.charAt(0)!=newCategory;newCategory=item.url.charAt(0);var elements=[];if(isNewCategory){elements.push(React.createElement("h1",{key:newCategory},newCategory));}elements.push(React.createElement(Link,{to:"/term/"+item.url,key:item.slug,className:item.Type},item.Term));return elements;}));};export default ListComponent;
